title: Patient Care Practical Competencies Enhancement: Practitioner Competency Development Program in Online and Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve language practical skills by 80% or more through project-based learning (PBL) in an online environment.
Learners can perform three or more feedback activities while collaborating with peers in a blended learning environment.
Learners can present two or more cases in a portfolio demonstrating the application of acquired language skills to real-world tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
